aboutText: An energetic group of diverse volunteers, passionate about saving the flying foxes population and all bats of Far North Queensland!

members.name: Maree Treadwell Kerr
members.title: President, Head Bat
members.desc: Maree,  is an ecologist and wildlife communicator, and has been active in flying-fox conservation and community education for over 30 years with a particular interest in bat tourism.

members.name: Hilary Whitehouse
members.title: Vice President, Wise Bat
members.desc: Associate Professor Hilary Whitehouse is an expert in climate change and sustainability education. She began direct involvement with flying-foxes during the heat stress event of 2018, where 23,000 flying-foxes died.
